function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 globally","Impact":"Increased illness and death, strain on healthcare systems, economic impact","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures, vaccination campaigns, travel restrictions","Technologies":"IoT, AI, UAVs, blockchain, 5G","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through respiratory system","Impact":"High infection rates, respiratory illnesses, potential for rapid spread","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, social distancing, improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"IoT, AI, UAVs, 5G","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers"},{"Description":"Uncertain origin of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding transmission pathways, tracking and containing the virus","Mitigation":"Genomic sequencing, wildlife monitoring, international collaboration on research","Technologies":"IoT, AI, blockchain","People":"Scientists, researchers, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, international health organizations"}]}
